languages.text: "И этот трус был моим драконом? Ты слишком поспешно зовешь Опустошительную бурю своим кабалом — у тебя не хватает ни амбиций, ни видения, чтобы вести за собой всех этих воинов, полных жажды власти и крови!"
"And this coward was my Dracon? You are too quick to call the Reaving Tempest your Kabal — you have neither the ambition nor the vision to lead all these warriors full of lust for power and blood!"
languages.original_text: "И этот трус был моим драконом? Ты слишком поспешно зовешь Опустошительную бурю своим кабалом — у тебя не хватает ни амбиций, ни видения, чтобы вести за собой всех этих воинов, полных жажды власти и крови!"

traits.locale_text: "And this coward was my Dracon? You are too quick to call the Reaving Tempest your Kabal — you have neither the ambition nor the vision to lead all these warriors full of lust for power and blood!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And this coward was my Dracon? You are too quick to call the Reaving Tempest your Kabal — you have neither the ambition nor the vision to lead all these warriors full of lust for power and blood!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And this coward was my Dracon? You are too quick to call the Reaving Tempest your Kabal — you have neither the ambition nor the vision to lead all these warriors full of lust for power and blood!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And this coward was my Dracon? You are too quick to call the Reaving Tempest your Kabal — you have neither the ambition nor the vision to lead all these warriors full of lust for power and blood!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “莫非这个懦夫就是我的裁决官吗？你竟敢说狂风阴谋团是‘你的’阴谋团？你既没有雄心壮志，也没有远见卓识！你根本无力领导这些渴望权利与鲜血的战士！”
languages.original_text: "And this coward was my Dracon? You are too quick to call the Reaving Tempest your Kabal — you have neither the ambition nor the vision to lead all these warriors full of lust for power and blood!"

traits.locale_text: “莫非这个懦夫就是我的裁决官吗？你竟敢说狂风阴谋团是‘你的’阴谋团？你既没有雄心壮志，也没有远见卓识！你根本无力领导这些渴望权利与鲜血的战士！”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Et ce lâche était mon dracon ? Vous osez prétendre que la Tempête ravageuse est votre Kabale, alors que vous n'avez ni l'ambition ni la vision nécessaires pour mener ces guerriers assoiffés de puissance et de sang ! »
languages.original_text: "And this coward was my Dracon? You are too quick to call the Reaving Tempest your Kabal — you have neither the ambition nor the vision to lead all these warriors full of lust for power and blood!"

traits.locale_text: « Et ce lâche était mon dracon ? Vous osez prétendre que la Tempête ravageuse est votre Kabale, alors que vous n'avez ni l'ambition ni la vision nécessaires pour mener ces guerriers assoiffés de puissance et de sang ! »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «¿Y este cobarde era mi Dracón? Te precipitas al afirmar que la Tempestad Asoladora es tu Kábala. ¡Careces de la ambición y la visión necesarias para dirigir a todos estos guerreros sedientos de poder y sangre!».
languages.original_text: "And this coward was my Dracon? You are too quick to call the Reaving Tempest your Kabal — you have neither the ambition nor the vision to lead all these warriors full of lust for power and blood!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Y este cobarde era mi Dracón? Te precipitas al afirmar que la Tempestad Asoladora es tu Kábala. ¡Careces de la ambición y la visión necesarias para dirigir a todos estos guerreros sedientos de poder y sangre!».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「この腰抜けが俺のドラコンだったのか？リーヴィング・テンペストをお前の陰謀団と呼ぶには早過ぎるぜ。お前には力と血への渇望に満ちた戦士全員を率いるだけの野心も見識もない！」
languages.original_text: "And this coward was my Dracon? You are too quick to call the Reaving Tempest your Kabal — you have neither the ambition nor the vision to lead all these warriors full of lust for power and blood!"

traits.locale_text: 「この腰抜けが俺のドラコンだったのか？リーヴィング・テンペストをお前の陰謀団と呼ぶには早過ぎるぜ。お前には力と血への渇望に満ちた戦士全員を率いるだけの野心も見識もない！」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Und dieser Feigling war mein Dracon? Ihr nennt den Plündernden Sturm etwas voreilig Eure Kabale — Ihr habt weder die Ambition noch die Vision, um all diese Krieger voller Gier nach Macht und Blut anzuführen!"
languages.original_text: "And this coward was my Dracon? You are too quick to call the Reaving Tempest your Kabal — you have neither the ambition nor the vision to lead all these warriors full of lust for power and blood!"

traits.locale_text: "Und dieser Feigling war mein Dracon? Ihr nennt den Plündernden Sturm etwas voreilig Eure Kabale — Ihr habt weder die Ambition noch die Vision, um all diese Krieger voller Gier nach Macht und Blut anzuführen!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Benim Drakon'um bu ödlek miymiş? Müfteris Kasırga'nın kendi Kabalın olduğunu söylemeye hakkın yok. Güç ve kan arzusuyla dolu bu savaşçıları yönetecek ne hırsın var ne de vizyonun!"
languages.original_text: "And this coward was my Dracon? You are too quick to call the Reaving Tempest your Kabal — you have neither the ambition nor the vision to lead all these warriors full of lust for power and blood!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu ödlek miydi benim Drakon'um? Müfteris Kasırga'nın kendi Kabal'ın olduğunu söylemeye hakkın yok. Güç ve kan arzusuyla dolu bu savaşçıları yönetecek ne hırsın vardı ne de vizyonun!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
